messages.zh: 每个人都有自己的路，你选择你的，她选择她的，
messages.en: Everyone has their own path to walk on, you choose yours, they choose theirs.

messages.zh: 只是有一些人的路比其他人要艰难得多，不过无论如何，总是殊途同归的。
messages.en: Some must walk on a difficult path, but in the end, the end is always the same.

messages.zh: 几年之前，我们成了感染者。
messages.en: A few years ago, we became infected.

messages.zh: 我们躲躲藏藏，平稳的生活一夜之间就变成了奢侈。
messages.en: We hid from the sight of other uninfected people, a normal life became a luxury overnight.

messages.zh: 原本，我们以为整合运动能使我们的生活有所改观，可......
messages.en: We used to think that joining the reunion movement would make a difference in our lives, but...

messages.zh: 仍旧没有一家店肯卖给我们面包，没有任何地方能容纳我们落脚。
messages.en: The bakery still did not sell us any bread. People still refuse to give us a place to stay.

messages.zh: 所以我和兄弟们离开了那里，四处流浪，直到听说了宝藏的消息，来到了这里。
messages.en: So my companions and I left the movement. We were wandering around until we heard about the treasure and came here.

messages.zh: 只要这次，只要我们能夺下这份宝藏——
messages.en: If we can take the treasure.

messages.zh: 我们就能前往哥伦比亚。虽然那是一片遥远的土地，但在那里，感染者还能拥有自己的城镇和田地。
messages.en: We can go to Colombia. While it is a remote land, the infected people can still have their own towns and fields there.

messages.zh: 所以，格拉尼，为了我所有的兄弟，这份宝藏我一定会拿到手。
messages.en: So, Grani, for the sake of all my companions, I must take this treasure.

messages.zh: 宝藏不远了，我知道。你做得很好，但是很遗憾————
messages.en: I know the treasure is not far. You did a good job, but I'm sorry————

messages.zh: 女人！你——
messages.en: Woman! You ——

messages.zh: 别挡路。
messages.en: Don't get in my way.

messages.zh: 呜啊！
messages.en: Uwah!

messages.zh: 我不管你们是什么人，要做什么事。
messages.en: I don't care who you are or what you are here for.

messages.zh: 你们所有人，马上从我的视线里消失。
messages.en: All of you, get out of my sight right now.

messages.zh: 如果一定要和你为敌，斯卡蒂......今天我们会死战到底。
messages.en: If we must be your enemy, Skadi... Today we will fight to the death.

messages.zh: 所以这种人就是格拉尼你找来的同伴？
messages.en: So this is the kind of person you found, Grani?

messages.zh: 你们拿了宝藏，那滴水村怎么办？
messages.en: If you took the treasure then what happens to droplet village?

messages.zh: 不管怎么样，他们都还能活下去，我们却已经无路可走了。
messages.en: Either way, they can still live on without the treasure, but we are at the end of our ropes.

messages.zh: 虽然我认识你没多久，但我知道你是什么样的人。
messages.en: I haven't known you for a long time, but I know what kind of person you are.

messages.zh: 你跟你身边那个怪物不一样，你没把我们感染者当成外人。
messages.en: You're not like the monster beside you. You don't see us as outsiders.

messages.zh: (我觉得斯卡蒂也只是一视同仁地把我们全都干掉而已，她大概也没把谁当成外人吧......)
messages.en: (I think Skadi will just take us all out equally, outsiders or not. I don’t think it even comes to her mind...)

messages.zh: 格拉尼，告诉我可萝尔在哪里！
messages.en: Grani! Tell me where Carol is!

messages.zh: 你知道这些宝藏对我们意味着什么！
messages.en: You know what the treasures means to us!

messages.zh: 抱歉大鲍勃，我已经接下委托了。
messages.en: Sorry big Bob, but I've already accepted her request.

messages.zh: 我只有一个任务，就是把这份宝藏交给可萝尔，帮助她让村子恢复平静。
messages.en: I have only one mission. To help Carol get the treasure and help her restore peace to her village.

messages.zh: 别的与我无关，把可萝尔交给我。
messages.en: I don't care about your problems, just give me Carol.

messages.zh: 那你要那个女孩干什么，怪物？
messages.en: What do you want with that girl, monster?

messages.zh: 你难道想要剥掉她的皮，喝掉她的血吗？
messages.en: Do you want to skin her and drink her blood?

messages.zh: 在这之前，你也听这个小个子说过了，不管怎么样，她都不会把村长交给你的！
messages.en: You also heard from this little kid who said 'no matter what I will never give Carol to you!'’'

messages.zh: 但我不一样，我只要宝藏。我根本不会伤害她！
messages.en: But I'm different. I only want the treasure. I wouldn't hurt Carol at all!

messages.zh: 我真的受够了......格拉尼，可萝尔在哪？
messages.en: I'm really fed up with you... Grani, where's Carol?

messages.zh: 可萝尔只是想保护这个村子。她其实也不在乎宝藏。
messages.en: Carol only wants to protect her village. She views the treasure less important than her village.

messages.zh: 那就把宝藏给我！
messages.en: Then give me the treasure!

messages.zh: 整合运动和赏金猎人也没什么不同。
messages.en: I see the reunion movement is really no different from the bounty hunters.

messages.zh: 我跟你们赏金猎人根本不是一路人！
messages.en: I'm different from you bounty hunters!

messages.zh: 我曾经也是斯卡蒂你这样的混蛋，但现在我全都看清楚了。
messages.en: I used to be an asshole like you Skadi but now that I experienced everything.

messages.zh: 眼下这个世道，什么财富，地位，都是狗屁。
messages.en: In this world, wealth and status are trash.

messages.zh: 我们只想靠那笔宝藏活下去，仅此而已！
messages.en: We just want that treasure to better our lives, that's all!

messages.zh: 我再说一遍，把可萝尔给我。
messages.en: I repeat, give me Carol.

messages.zh: 无论是可萝尔还是宝藏，我都不会交给你们。
messages.en: I'm not giving Carol or the treasure to you.

messages.zh: 这可是我的委托。
messages.en: It is my duty.

messages.zh: 格拉尼！你还有机会！我不想和你打这场对谁都没好处的架！
messages.en: Grani! You still have a chance! I don't want to fight you in a battle that won't help anyone!

messages.zh: 我只要拿到宝藏，谁都不会吃苦头！
messages.en: If I get the treasure, no one else will suffer!

messages.zh: 这份宝藏里本来就有你那一份，大鲍勃！
messages.en: You had your share of the treasure, big Bob!

messages.zh: 我还有我的兄弟们！我要先见到宝藏再说！
messages.en: I have my own companions to think of! I must see the treasure first!

messages.zh: 如果要用武力的话，我们之间的差距，你们自己心里明白。
messages.en: If you use force, you know the difference of strength between us.

messages.zh: 虽然没什么自信，但如果要同时和你们开战，我能做到。
messages.en: I don't have that much confidence, but if I had to fight you all at the same time, I will do it.

messages.zh: 至少我们之间的问题是可以解决的，格拉尼！
messages.en: At least we can solve our problems between us, Grani!

messages.zh: 不。
messages.en: I refuse.

messages.zh: 那我们就先解决她！
messages.en: Then we'll take care of her first!

messages.zh: 说完了没？
messages.en: Are you done talking?

messages.zh: 如果在这里开战，就真的没有回头路可走了！
messages.en: If we fight here, there really is no turning back!

messages.zh: 格拉尼！
messages.en: Grani!

messages.zh: 太好了，我找到了！我找到宝藏了！
messages.en: Great, I found it! I found the treasure!

messages.zh: 我好不容易都把整箱都拖出———
messages.en: It wasn’t easy hauling the whole chest out --

messages.zh: 鲍勃先生！
messages.en: Mr Bob!

messages.zh: 你平安无事就——
messages.en: You're safe! It’s a good——

messages.zh: 别过来！
messages.en: Don't come any closer!
Huh?!
..... Hpmh!
Hah... Hah...

messages.zh: 我们......早就没有回头路了!
messages.en: We... There's no turning back for us!

messages.zh: 诶？可萝尔！
messages.en: Eh? Carol!

messages.zh: 斯卡蒂！
messages.en: Skadi!

messages.zh: 你为什么要用这种没有威力的爆破物？
messages.en: Why did you use such a weak explosive?

messages.zh: 还给她的人情。
messages.en: I owed her one.

messages.zh: 接下来，就要用真的了。
messages.en: Now, I’m going to use the real thing.

messages.zh: 斯卡蒂。
messages.en: Skadi.

messages.zh: 你不关心宝藏。而且，你也不想伤害可萝尔小姐。
messages.en: You don't care about the treasure. And you don't want to hurt miss Carol.

messages.zh: 否则，在爆炸的那一瞬间，你就会出手掳走她并抢走宝藏，而不是保护她了吧。
messages.en: Otherwise, at the instant of that explosion, you could have taken the treasure instead of protecting Carol.

messages.zh: 我不要宝藏。我要的答案在可萝尔身上。
messages.en: I don't want the treasure. I only need answers from Carol.

messages.zh: 早说出来不就好了！
messages.en: Why didn’t you said so earlier!

messages.zh: 实话说，强装坏人也很累吧？坦率一点也好嘛。
messages.en: To tell you the truth, isn't it tiring to be the bad guy? Be more honest next time.

messages.zh: 我不想让其他人卷进我的......任务里。
messages.en: I don't want anyone else getting involved in my... mission.

messages.zh: 但这次的任务目标对我而言，真的很重要。
messages.en: The goal of this mission is really important to me.

messages.zh: 那当然，我知道。虽然我们任务不同，但方向是一致的不是吗？
messages.en: Of course, I know. Although our missions are different, the end is the same, isn't it?

messages.zh: 帮助其他干员完成任务，理所应当的吧！
messages.en: Of course I will help another operator with their mission!

messages.zh: 哼。
messages.en: Hmm.

messages.zh: 只能用武力来裁定宝藏的归属了。
messages.en: It seems the treasure can only be determined by strength.

messages.zh: 斯卡蒂，下手一定要轻一点，轻一点哦！
messages.en: Skadi, please don’t be too brutal on them. Please!

messages.zh: 格 拉 尼！
messages.en: Grani!

messages.zh: 鲍勃大叔，抱歉，可能会有点疼！
messages.en: Uncle Bob, I'm sorry, it might hurt a little!
